meanings.sent1: The wiry branches of the tree swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She had a wiry frame that allowed her to climb effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The wiry old dog tried to chase after the squirrel but got tangled in its own leash.
meanings.sent4: His wiry determination to finish the race inspired others to push harder.
meanings.sent5: The wiry texture of the rope reminded him of his childhood adventures.

meanings.definition: Having a lean and muscular build.
meanings.sent1: The wiry athlete sprinted across the finish line with ease.
meanings.sent2: His wiry arms flexed as he lifted the heavy weights.
meanings.sent3: The wiry cat gracefully leaped from one rooftop to another.
meanings.sent4: Her wiry strength surprised everyone at the gym.
meanings.sent5: The wiry dancer moved with precision and grace on stage.

meanings.sent1: The wiry sculpture in the park caught the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She wore a wiry bracelet that jingled softly with each movement.
meanings.sent3: The wiry fence kept the rabbits out of the garden.
meanings.sent4: His wiry glasses reflected the glow of the computer screen.
meanings.sent5: The wiry design of the necklace reminded her of her grandmother's jewelry.
